lead_paragraph: While finding little domestic economic harm in recent market turmoil, policy makers expect to raise rates by just half a percentage point this year.

headline.print_headline: Fed Puts Off Rate Rise, in Step Back From Plans
headline.main: Fed Slows Down on Plans to Pursue Interest Rate Increases

snippet: While finding little domestic economic harm in recent market turmoil, policy makers expect to raise rates by just half a percentage point this year.
abstract: Federal Reserve votes not to raise benchmark interest rate, postponing long-term plan due to caution over weak global economy; Chairwoman Janet L Yellen asserts confidence in overall domestic economy, but Fed now projects that it will reduce rate by only half percentage point in 2016, down from earlier projection of full point.
